website_summaries.verdict: A generous appliance in every sense. It's a fantastic dehydrator that's worth its high price tag.
pros: Offers a class-leading 15 square feet of drying space
Thoroughly and rapidly dehydrates food at a level that exceeds competitors
cons: Trays do not fit in many dishwashers

customer_reviews.title: Item cannot be returned/refunded
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware that this item is non-returnable. ... which is kind of ridiculous since it was not noted anywhere as such.
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: You and cooking in a toxic stew!! Bpa inside lining!!
customer_reviews.text: Beware you are cooking in a toxic stew trying to be healthy! Sure, the shelves are bpa free, but the rest of the inside structure I found out isn't. There's studies of rats living in a bpa cage and they found bpa in them. It off gases. So if you are into health stuff like me, yes it works good, but super toxic. People recommend this one because they established themselves BEFORE the bpa awareness come out. Plastic inside?? Why??? This company obviously doesn't care about the health of their customer and they know better....
customer_reviews.author: Holistic lifestyle

customer_reviews.title: Costzon dehydrators are less expensive and last longer.
customer_reviews.text: Last September we purchased one of these "Excalibur 3926TB 9-Tray Electric Food Dehydrators" from Amazon. It lasted about six months and then the fan stopped turning. I admit that we use dehydrators all day long, almost every day; however, last September we also bought a "Costzon 630W Electric Food Dehydrator 10 Drying Trays Food Preserver Fruit Dehydro Commercial" from Amazon. The Costzon dehydrator is still working very well. The price of the Costzon dehydrator is less than half the cost of the Excalibur dehydrator, and it lasts much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Summit

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE BRAND! Sent wrong door & looked refurbished. Missing manual & cookbook. Rip off. Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE. Do not buy this brand!!! I knew I should’ve taken the bad reviews seriously for this cheap product. Completely over priced & came with terrible packaging and the WRONG DOOR for this product! Also was missing the manual & cookbook! It looked used and broken when it came & couldn’t believe it came with the wrong front door.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Missing a mesh sheet. Company will not call back ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing a mesh sheet. Company will not call back with my complaints. Found I paid the same price for a cheap plastic box as a metal commercial double the size dehydrator elsewhwere.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: So far this has been awesome. Works very well
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been awesome. Works very well. Can fit a lot of fruit, jerkey in it. Easy to clean. It seems to be louder when more is in it but that's hasn't been a problem for us. We use it a lot. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ralston

customer_reviews.title: That everything is in the box and don’t use parchment paper
customer_reviews.text: Best dehydrator I’ve ever owned. This is the second one. Only thing I wish is that i would have bought the one with the timer. My box did not have the flex sheets in it like it was supposed to and could really use them for fruit leathers. I would not recommend parchment paper though like some online recipes say.. 1. It gets brittle fire hazard I think. 2. Dries out the fruit leather. 3. Does not hold up that well for wet stuff like the fruit leather. Can’t go wrong with this dehydrator it beats all of the others!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great product and better customer service
customer_reviews.text: An amazing dehydrator. I've done beef and venison jerky, my wife uses it to make her spices and dehydrates fruit for the kids. Great product. But their customer service is beyond outstanding. After a month and a half the timer stopped working. I contacted Excalibur and they sent me a new dehydrator with a return shipping label to return the defective one within a day. I am absolutely amazed at how fast they are with resolving the problem I had with my dehydrator. I will never buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Dehydrator!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this dehydrator. I debated whether to get the Best of the Best. I first ordered a Nesco and it arrived damaged. I immediately returned to Amazon without any problems. I then ordered the Excalibur. Sure glad I did. There is NO comparison between the 2 brands. If you are hesitating over the Excalibur for the price difference, it is worth it! It actually fits the counter space much better than the Nesco would have and is much less noticeable. Looks somewhat like a microwave sitting on the counter. It also is not as loud as I imagined. I have used it many times over the last few months.
customer_reviews.author: Star Bright

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use-takes up a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with this dehydrator. I was originally going to return it without trying it because it was so large ( 9 tray model) however after reading instructions and recipes (included) I realized how simple it is to use. Since I live in South Florida I was concerned about heat coming from the machine, however, the drying temps are so low it does not heat up the house like I thought. Overall, I give it 5 stars, when I opened the box the temp knob had fallen off, and I thought damaged. But it popped back on with little effort. I do feel that for the price nothing should be falling off in S&H
customer_reviews.author: Gar

customer_reviews.title: So far great dehydrator!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this dehydrator works great.I see people saying how noisy this unit is and I have to say it is not loud at all.All I here is a fan and it's not loud! I have a batch of apples and strawberries going as we speak! I did alot of research on dehydrators and if your looking to dehydrate a good amount of food at a time then this is the dehydrator for you! There are good cheaper models out there but nothing that can do the volume that this unit does! So far I'm completely satisfied with this dehydrator!
customer_reviews.author: corey e.

customer_reviews.title: ... but this one the 3926TB is by far much better it is absolutely the best
customer_reviews.text: We own an Excalibur 2900 but this one the 3926TB is by far much better it is absolutely the best. The timer makes it so much easier to use. My wife just loves it and plans on dehydrating for long term storage in case of emergencies. This Excalibur the 3926TB drys faster and and we don't have to wake up to check on the product at 3am. We just set the timer and go to sleep with the knowledge that when it's done it will shut off by it's self, now we don't have to watch the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph H Moran

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: this dehydrator works 100% better than the old round ones you can buy in the store. worth the investment. I've made a ton of apple chips in it already and works so nice for making beef jerky as well. also started putting any leftover veggies we have in the fridge - peppers, celery, carrots, even herbs.. in it and have them set aside for soup starter later this fall. My husband loves how mushrooms dry in this - they re-hydrate great or he can put them in a coffee grinder and add them into things as a powder... saving us lots of money not letting veggies, etc, go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skip the cheap junk and save yourself a headache
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a cheap Chinese one I sent back. Should have started with this. Works amazing well. 14" trays hold alot of food. The only 2 issues I have found at all are the trays are close enough together that thicker items require leaving a tray out and at this price point I would have expected either some metal construction or something that felt a little bit heavier duty. Not saying it won't work well for years but just seems a little bit light. I also feel the optional see through door should be standard at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Puck

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy and the size to buy
customer_reviews.text: What can I say?! I love this machine!!! I have dehydrated jerky (chicken and beef), apples, pears, pineapples, oranges, bananas and sweet potatoes. I used it so much that I had to buy more canning jars. Get the one with the timer - it makes all of the difference. Now I buy in bulk and store for off season times. Your children will enjoy dehydrated foods and you will avoid preservatives and other bad snacks by making them yourself. See some of my other reviews if you are curious about how I cut prep time in half! I purchased this through Amazon's warehouse deals and saved a lot of money, too.
customer_reviews.author: V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Excalibur- not because the first one broke down, but because I do a lot of dehydrating and wanted another unit. I have only positive things to say about this dehydrator- it works, it lasts, and it's helped me preserve hundreds of pounds of food already. I've even taken the shelves out and incubated a gallon jug of buttermilk in it. Do yourself a favor and get an Excalibur-- your grandchildren will thank you when they inherit it some day.
customer_reviews.author: shortcakemt

customer_reviews.title: This is a definte must have for the cooking lover!
customer_reviews.text: I am a new dehydrator user, and after reading the reviews on this site I decided to order, and THANKFULLY I DID! I love this wonderful piece of equipment. I have had this for a while now, maybe a little less than a year. I have used this to make dried fruit like bananas and apples, and also to make granola, all of which has turned out GREAT! It has so many trays and is not too big! If we had a bigger sink I am sure it would be easier to clean the trays but other than the cleanup (which who likes doing that anyways) I have had no trouble at all!
customer_reviews.author: MeowsMix

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, top of the mid-ranged gear/solid budget conscious high end
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the problem with my first order, it has been great! I marked it down one star due to the hassle of the first dehydrator. It wouldn't turn off automatically, thus defeating the purpose of the automatic timer. Aside from that, my second unit has been flawless. Timer works great, temps are spot on, cleaning is relatively easy (plastic trays can be difficult to get tomatoes off), and it is a great size for dehydrating (wife doesn't like the behemoth on the counter though!), and overall it's a solid unit.
customer_reviews.author: str8moben

customer_reviews.title: Dropped
customer_reviews.text: I just had this delivered and the box was unsealed, there were no instructions and the shelves were all jammed in the machine. I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Purcell

customer_reviews.title: A friend recommended this brand of dehydrator so I saved up and ...
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this brand of dehydrator so I saved up and bought one. So glad I did. Very easy to use and well built. I've heard of people owning and using this brand of dehydrating units for many years (one friend says she's using her mother's and remembers her mom using it when she was a kid). I bought the clear front cover for this unit and the silicone tray liners as well. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C. Easter

customer_reviews.title: The product is defective.
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered 2 of these machines. The first arrived with a broken door. We sent it back and ordered another. The 2nd machine arrived but the fan does not work. The machine is packaged so poorly, that they are damaged in shipping. I will not be ordering any more from this company. A terrible product!!! Do not buy one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Doty

customer_reviews.title: Excalibur 3926TB Dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: One major problem with this machine is that it doesn't have digital electronic controls, only analog manual twist Temp & Time settings. This makes it impossible to set the temperature accurately or the timer within plus or minus 10 minutes. Because of this you need to babysit the machine when you think food is close to being done but you don't want to over dry something. This was extremely disappointing to me given the $300.00 price tag. Other then that it really does a nice job of dehydrating without having to constantly rotate the trays. It heats evenly and cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Martell

customer_reviews.title: The good, Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: The good, Very high quality, really like the 9 shelf's big enough to dry large batches. The bad, doesn't come with any non stick sheets, They are extra. Also don't think the one with the Timer is worth an extra 50.00. Also if you buy it anywhere besides the manufacturer you don't get the 10 year warranty. Anyway I believe it's the best dehydrator for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Dehydrator!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Excalibur Dehydrator. It performs as described. This dehydrator evenly dries foods. One thing I have learned is dry time will vary with environmental conditions. Sometimes quite a bit. While you can hear the unit when operating, it is quiet compared to other dehydrators I've had. So far I've used this unit to dry mint and chocolate basil from my garden, cashews, hazelnuts, almonds, and more! Love this machine!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Plaster

customer_reviews.title: Packaging for this kind of device is sup par so expect a return or two for a good unit. Dehydrator works well
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived broken. I received an email while waiting for replacement stating the replacement was broken I transit and they would be sending a third unit. The third one arrived and was serviceable. Packaging for this kind of device is sup par so expect a return or two for a good unit. Dehydrator works well, first one I've owned that had a real timer. I do wish metal was incorporated in the sides of the unit because I can see it flexing/bulging with repeated use... Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Product received with some cosmetic defects.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for her birthday. It came on time and she is excited to use it. Only problem is the top panel where the control dials are, there is a dent in between the temperature and the timer dial. There is also a fracture on the top right corner / edge. I asked my mom if she wanted to return it and get another one, but she does not want to go through the hassle of packaging everything back up and shipping it. So she just started using it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Creeland Burrows

customer_reviews.title: The mac daddy of dehydrators
customer_reviews.text: And it certainly lives up to it's name....this thing is slick....complete control. Doin a huge batch of jerky right now, but have done fruit, veggies, what ever blows your hair back.....play with it. My favorite is dehydrating sweet peppers and then grinding them into dust in a spice grinder, sprinkle on everything, eggs....etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brodus

customer_reviews.title: A real workhorse
customer_reviews.text: We've had this over 3 years and use it to dry our harvest and shopping deals. It's a little noisy and puts out heat (expected) but does a super job dying the goods The flexibility of the temperature gage gives the ability to do a wide variety of food prep, and being able to pack a lot of stuff on the 9 trays make it indispensable during harvest.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Russo

customer_reviews.title: Loud Rattle When Filled:
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty much as expected. The biggest issue is that it has a loud rattle when all trays are full. The sound is coming from the rear of the unit, not the trays. If I take out two trays it does not make as much noise but it still has a rattle. Interesting, I thought that I bought and paid for a 9 tray unit but with the increased noise when full it is only a 7 tray unit. I will contact the manufacture with some hope that this noise issue can be resolved at a minimal additional cost.
customer_reviews.author: ABD

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. I really like the auto off feature for setting a certain amount of hours. I've done onions with tomatoes at the same time and taste test of tomatoes didn't seem to be any different. I've processed tomatoes, apples, herbs, apples beans, kale, cucumbers, chard and peppers. The book is good for a person who knows preservation and dehydration but could be limited for a newby.
customer_reviews.author: MaryB

customer_reviews.title: Controls in a bad place
customer_reviews.text: I do really like this dehydrator. The only complaint I have, and that’s why only 4 stars, is that the timer & temperature controls are in the BACK of the unit, on top. So, if you’re using it on your counter under cabinets, you’ll have to pull it to change any settings. Other than that, it dehydrates evenly & “quickly”.
customer_reviews.author: FireFly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to rotate trays
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great workhorse of a dehydrator. Fan is a little noisy, but then it IS a fan after all. I found the food in the middle and closer to the back dried a bit faster than the rest, but it was also super easy to rotate and turn the trays in the unit. LOVE the timer function on the unit so food doesn't get over done if you are drying overnight or unsupervised. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Allison

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it lasted..
customer_reviews.text: Had great fun with it over the summer drying beef, chicken for the dog and the abundance of tomatoes that I grew.. Didn't use it for 8 months and when I turned it on, well, thats it, it didn't turn on.. Disappointment..
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Get it, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I decided to go with this item and spend a bit more money than I originally planned to. Used it a couple of times to dehydrate herbs and it did a fantastic job. It is on the expensive side but worth every penny in opinion.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline ovalles

customer_reviews.title: Great dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: I love this dehydrator ----it is easy to use, is surprisingly quiet. After some complained it was noisy I expected it to be MUCH louder. I have used it a lot already and it has never disappointed. It was packed well and arrived one day early.
customer_reviews.author: maplek

customer_reviews.title: DOES WHAT IT SAYS IT WILL
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to make crackers since far and it works great! I did have to lower the temp and increase the time to keep the edges from getting done way before the rest.
customer_reviews.author: nope

customer_reviews.title: Food Dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic dehydrator. I had a small round dehydrator that I used for years and finally decided to give myself a treat. This did a far better job than my ten year old round dehydrator. Grapes went down to a dollar a pound so I bought ten pounds. Sliced them all in half and filled all eight shelves. Set up the temperature and the timer and 22 hours later I had perfect raisins. mason jars full of them. Best tasting I have ever had. The machine was quiet and worked perfectly. The raisins had the same consistency and level of dehydration on each shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Photonut

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a "damaged" one. Box was a bit battered but everything was perfect. Have already made several items in it and am absolutely in love. 9 trays is for a serious and dedicated person. 10ish lbs of halved grapes fit on 6 trays with EASE. Definitely get one with temp AND timer!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: noisy
customer_reviews.text: dries OK but the noise is too much. Rattles so much I put it outside on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Camper

customer_reviews.title: I would give it a 4. 5.. ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 4.5..so far the only issue is the control knobs for the timer and temp are not properly fitted and fall off with the slightest touch..they have to be realigned each time and pressed down when turned...either the mechansm inside can be raised up or the knobs could be extended 1/4" or so.
customer_reviews.author: James Stith

customer_reviews.title: just absolutely love it. Have had other brands
customer_reviews.text: just absolutely love it. Have had other brands, none have worked as well. The timer and the temperature settings are critical to success and this unit has both. The drying is much more even. And finally, a unit with enough trays! Thank you, Excalibur! Now...just work on getting that ridiculous price down. After all, this product is really just a fan in a box with a lot of shelves, a timer and a thermostate. You guys must be making a fortune, cuz it can't cost that much to manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra W

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the timer because it allows you go leave with ...
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for a couple of times. Each time, it works very well. I especially like the timer because it allows you go leave with the knowledge that your dehydrator won't over dry your items. Color is great as well, and not brown as with other dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Retired flyboy

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It takes away all my excuses for not using it. The settings are simple and color coded for the temps, and the timer is set and forget. I broke it in with mushrooms, corn, green beans, and tomatoes. It performed great! This is an excellent product. The unit arrived on time in new condition. This product, if cleaned and stored properly will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: UnkaJerl

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice product! Pineapple stuck to my round dehydrator and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product! Pineapple stuck to my round dehydrator and I couldn't bend the shelves to get it off. This dehydrator has bendable plastic mesh that makes taking food off the shelf so easy! There was included a dehydrating guide in which the charts were good except for page 12 being mostly a giant typo, it reprinted all the directions from page 10. I will probably have to go on-line to get the correct directions for that whole list of vegetables. Otherwise, I'm very happy with the purchase. I bought a "damaged" unit from the warehouse for less money and it is really difficult to find any cosmetic damage anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Moore

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!! I always wanted a dehydrator that worked ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!! I always wanted a dehydrator that worked well and held lots of food and this is it!! So far I have made oodles of fruit rollups for the family as they are so simple and nutritious. I have also made crispy kale chips, and lots of dried fruits from our trees. I love that I can easily store the dried fruits to have on hand during the winter months. The trays are easy to clean up, the instructions are easy to read, and it was ready to use straight out of the box. With a little experimenting, this is a fabulous addition to our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Marie McEachin

customer_reviews.title: Professional! I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I am a first time owner and before this brand I tried cheaper ones and I had problems. Expensive but worth it, do your budget so you can save in other ways. Very professional. I am so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Best dehydrator, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: We frequently dehydrate meals for camping and hiking, but the best use we found is preserving foods and reducing wasteful discarding of fruits and vegetables going bad. Clean eating is expensive enough without seeing fresh foods wasted. It is large enough to do several meals at once.
customer_reviews.author: SParker

customer_reviews.title: I used it in my classroom (I am a teacher) and my first graders LOVED making their own dried fruit treats
customer_reviews.text: We use this daily! I didn't think we'd use it every day, but we sure do. So many uses, and I am relieved we went for the larger 9-tray size. It's not as loud as some people have mentioned (at least for me)... I used it in my classroom (I am a teacher) and my first graders LOVED making their own dried fruit treats! After making nut milk, I dry my leftover nut pulp in this deydrator so I can add the dried pulp to my granola bars. I absolutely LOVE my excalibur!
customer_reviews.author: Cori & Company

customer_reviews.title: works works
customer_reviews.text: works well. I have made jerky a few times in it. Hate cleaning it up afterward though, it is too big to really fit in the sink, regular double kitchen sink, so you can't soak it. and remember to turn the timer on or it shuts off, we use the micro timer for the buzzing when done and can hear it where ever we are in the house, other than that, it works like it should. The jerky has come out awesome. I'm excited to add more to my repertoire but not looking forward to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: H Duhaime

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for jerky, fruit, etc...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Has a setting for every kind of food you want to dehydrate. We made a lot of deer jerky with this, and the auto-timer shutoff made all the difference. I set it and forgot it till it was done, and the air flow system worked great dehydrating the meat regardless of which tray it was on.
customer_reviews.author: WyomingDad

customer_reviews.title: We love our dehydrator!
customer_reviews.text: Great dehydrator! The only reason I gave it a 4 is, as mentioned in other reviews, it's very loud. We keep it in the pantry room as it runs for hours and could be annoying if your having to listen to it. It works fantastic! I have plenty of dried fruit to last me days! And, it saves me and my wife big $$$ from purchasing dried fruit at the our local Whole Foods. It arrived as described and in perfect condition. (Tip) I did however place a wooden block (2x4x2) and wedged it between the back of the dehydrator and the wall - it softens the sound of the metal fan. WE love it!!
customer_reviews.author: adrian rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I do enjoy my dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy my dehydrator. I think this one is a very good choice as it has a timer and temp. control. I make yogurt in it and have made fruit leathers, vegetables, celery salt, apple chips and the list goes on. It has the motor and blower at the back so gives an even drying coverage unlike top down or bottom up ones. The one thing I do the most of is crispy nuts. I soak most nuts over night in salted water and then dehydrate. Very good. I got this idea from the Nourishing Traditions cook book by Sally Fallon Only way I like nuts any more.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Vos

customer_reviews.title: A quality, dependable dehydrator at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago we purchased a brand X dehydrator with a beautiful, shinny stainless steel case through Amazon. It, and its replacement were pieces of junk that did not last but a few days. If you want a good dependable dehydrator buy an Excalibur.
customer_reviews.author: Soapguy

customer_reviews.title: Yummy beef jerky
customer_reviews.text: I have only dehydrated beef jerky so far. It was really good and the machine was easy to use. The hardest part was curing the meat. I am giving it 4 stars because it doesn't dehydrate evenly. The lower sections dry out faster then the upper racks. Other then that, it is an excellent machine!
customer_reviews.author: jenb

customer_reviews.title: Great for dehydrating a lot
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year now only use it occasionally. Never had a problem with it, it would've been nice if it came with sheets for dehydrating liquids. This is a large dehydrator and i'm able to fit a lot of food in it. Mine was missing one of the plastic sheets. (i'm not sure what they are called)
customer_reviews.author: Will.who

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dehydrator !! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: We have dried, apples, strawberries, sweet potatoes. We have made several batches of jerky from lean hamburger that have been yummy. We have also dried chicken breasts & liver strips for dog treats that have been a big success.
customer_reviews.author: Kamper

customer_reviews.title: Dehydrator worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but well worth it. We dehydrate a lot and and this has stood up to everything we tried. It takes longer than the instructions state and using fruit fresh or citric acid is a must for vegetables and fruits. I made jerky from a chuck roast which is notoriously tough but the jerky turned out great. Of course, it is not a professional grade machine (which can cost as much as $15K) but for a family or two it is very capable for everything you would want to do.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great minus the noise.
customer_reviews.text: At times, it is so loud from vibrations that I want to kick kittens! OK, not really that bad, kittens are safe. I have used this for sliced round, ground beef, banana, strawberries, apples, grapes, etc and love it so far. Red apples are my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jettblack

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS THING! Way better and more versatile than expected
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if it would be worth putting down the extra bread to get a larger unit like this. I was tempted to custom build one. However, this is a very well thought out design. Very easy to clean. Has a nice capacity. Compact, pretty quiet, wide temperature range and very effective and doesn't look bad. This company knows what it's doing and have addressed the application very effectively. Impressed and very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fixer-upper

customer_reviews.title: Arguably the best home dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best dehydrator for home use. Evenly dehydrates on every shelf. Lots of space for food items. Controls are accurate and work well. Cleans up nicely. Some noise but not enough to interfere with conversations around the kitchen counter where it is sitting when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Highland Horseman

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I made a nut loaf with the purchase and it worked like a charm. Thank you. Great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Best Food Dryer Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter. She loves it! Excaliber is a great dehydrator. I have one thats 30+ years old and still working great!!
customer_reviews.author: 2dmfish

customer_reviews.title: love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Best dehydrator ive bought yet. even heat distibution, plenty of room for multiple things at once, mostl.use for jerky
customer_reviews.author: Gervas79

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I never knew I needed!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the dehydrator often for fruit leather (no additives or sugar), dehydrated apples and quince. The setup is easy, the product comes out nice and tasty. We are taking our dehydrated fruit on our trips to everyone's envy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonka

customer_reviews.title: I love the built in timer and range of temps with ...
customer_reviews.text: Pure USA ingenuity. This is the king of dehydrators, in size, features, quality and dependability. I love the built in timer and range of temps with a labeled guide. With nine trays, you can really fill this one up. When our fig trees decided to produce hundreds of figs ripe for picking at the same time, it really came in handy. There is no need to rotate your trays with the airflow circulation. Makes the tastiest jerky ever.
customer_reviews.author: Murphk9s

customer_reviews.title: Fruit roll ups out of apple sauce is even better: )
customer_reviews.text: Get it. I have 7 apple trees and now I can eat dried apples year around. Fruit roll ups out of apple sauce is even better :) Yummy
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dehydrator last summer to be able to process my persimmon tree that otherwise goes to waste. It is super easy to use. I have dehydrated fruit leather, persimmons, apples, and bananas and am looking forward to trying even more!
customer_reviews.author: Christine T.

customer_reviews.title: Good balance between capacity, and counterspace occupied!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, noise isn't really an issue for me, but a variable fan speed might be a good option for future iterations. Have already processed several pounds of herbs, and some stone fruits. Jerky will be my next project!
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great dehydrator, love that it also came with a book that told where to go online to find more dehydrating recipes. I've already done banana chips, strawberries, apple slices and even some fruit leather. Simple, easy to use, it's basically a set it and forget it machine which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best presents I have ever given myself
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best presents I have ever given myself. It is so wonderful. I can dry huge quantities of fruits and veggies in this enormous machine. For years I used the little round ones- they work but yikes this is so superior!!! I would highly reccd this to anyone who does dehydration. It uses much less energy than the round ones. It truly is the best machine out there.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: That way I can make large batches and enjoy them at a later date
customer_reviews.text: I can my "leftovers". That way I can make large batches and enjoy them at a later date. Things that aren't getting used up quickly enough are candidates for drying. Dried Jalapeño Escabeche is great!!! This dryer is so much easier to use than the ones I've been using. Temperature control! I haven"t had that before and I love it! And the cleanup is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Merv Martin

customer_reviews.title: Still functionally sound but sad that the packing was not better
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived damaged, small pieces chipped off corner of cabinet still inside box. Still functionally sound but sad that the packing was not better, front right corner also came unglued due to impact while being shipped. I would still recommend the Excalibur 3926TB that's why I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Grandparents

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is fantastic. It dries great. I don't have to rotate trays. It dries cleanly, the space is much bigger, than most dehydrators. The noise of this machine is just like my microwave. You hear it, but you can carry on a normal conversation sitting right next to it. If you are ready for a dehydrator, this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This dehydrator is well made and well worth the price. The 9 tray is a must for gardeners. I ran mine round the clock to keep up with my harvest season and had no issues. It is easy to load, unload and easy to clean. I strongly recommend getting the liners ( and they store nicely on the bottom when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Debra W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product, its worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best buy i made for drying food, family of 7. It is hard to have fresh on hand all the time, with this i can dry food and store knowing it was not packed with preservatives and other bad things for my kids. Great product, easy to use, loved the book that came with it for examples / how to use for different food types.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Something very special for my sister.
customer_reviews.text: My sister has dehydrated her garden and fruit produce for years. She always used two or three of the cheap round dehydrators. It was time consuming and the dehydrators would deteriorate in a year or two. I told her before her birthday in January that I was sending her the Mercedes Benz equivalent of something she really needed. She was stumped, but when it arrived, she was beside herself.. She has used it many times since then and is always amazed at how easy and fast it has made her task.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: First time dehydrating
customer_reviews.text: Received our dehydrator a couple weeks ago. Already used for two batches of jerky and some fruit. It works great. It does help to get the one with a timer, that way you don't have to wait around for the end, it just turns off when it's scheduled. Since this is our first time dehydrating, we did not fill all the trays since we were experimenting. When I took out the trays that are not being utilized, it cut down on noise considerably. I think it was more vibration noise. Very simple to use and would recommend for anybody interested.
customer_reviews.author: Trickystitches

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Knobs operational and firmly attached, trays in good order and correctly installed. Fan, heater, and thermometer working fine, still need to test timer. Already made dried asparagus, green onion, banana, grapes and apples with cinnamon. Planning to dry seeds, make yogurt, raise bread, make raw breads and crackers, fruit leathers, jerky and lots of dried flowers, herbs and vegetables. Thanks for the great service and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayce Cover

customer_reviews.title: Dehydrate Just About Anything
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for those who like to dehydrate lots of foods. First of all, you put each foodstuff on its own rack (so you can do several at once). There's a pretty good amount of space in this unit so you can do apples, bananas, tomatoes, and coconuts all at the same time. Next, you can dehydrate pretty much anything, to include meats, safely because it allows much higher temperatures than cheaper units. I strongly recommend the non-stick dehydrator sheets (the generic is the way to go, btw).
customer_reviews.author: Seemann

customer_reviews.title: allow great air flow
customer_reviews.text: This dehydrator is rated tops by consumers for a reason - it works! It is quiet and thorough. The square shelves hold a lot, allow great air flow, and wash easily. The timer feature adds reliability and simplifies the process. I use it more often and for more foods than I ever did with my previous plastic stack-a-tray food drier.
customer_reviews.author: Diane the Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE this Machine!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a work horse. Many will ask "why pay that kind of price" well you will spend double the cost in energy cost if you buy one of the circular, cheaper models from other companies. PLUS this thing comes with a warranty from the company that other manufacture's only dream of offering. If you are serious about food dehydrating then I say take the plunge its totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: MDP

customer_reviews.title: Great dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: As a professional raw food chef, I really enjoy excalibur's food dehydrators. It's one of the top two brands. Like all dehydrators, they are a bit noisy, and this has a bulky size, but can fit just about anything you make. I've even had several different items dehydrating together. I recommend ones with a timer, and if you're worried about it being an eye soar, they now come in a stainless look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than I really needed, but works as ...
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I really needed, but works as advertised. The one downside is the plastic trays and screens. They are flimsy and not dishwasher safe. I expect them to break with any regular use. For this price, you should get metal. Unfortunately, 9 metal trays are an additional $100.
customer_reviews.author: Corey S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Needs more secure packing inside
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with the packing of the trays. They were jammed in at an angle and stuck against the screen. When I started it up with loaded trays there was a loud vibration. I pulled the screen away from the fan as the manual suggested but the problem still exists. Not sure that it is the screen. Instead it now appears the motor is out of balance and is effected by the amount of backward air circulating against the fan. Think I will be sending it back. Be aware this seems to be a common problem with shipping according to the company.
customer_reviews.author: RedCrystal Peacock

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: Wife has wanted one of these foe a long time so I finally gave in and it is all it says it is and more. Wife is having a great time dehydrating everything she can and so far everything has come out the way it is supposed to. I am glad I gave in. I agree that this is one of the best on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Forgette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this to dehydrate all kinds of fruits and vegetables. It’s nice to dehydrate fruits like pineapple without the added sugar like the store brand and the funny thing it doesn’t need the extra sugar.
customer_reviews.author: robert fogarty

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH ROOM.  FULLY Adjustable temperature range for ANYTHING you can think of.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this product. Fruit rolls, dried fruits and veggies. Make your own dried soup mixes. Trail mixes. Dehydrated potatoes in many styles. High temp for Jerky. No temp for herbs.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Efficient! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases this year! Love It Love It! Sooooooo Much Even drying surface! Amazing! Wish I had gotten this one first. Cuts drying time by soooo much! And I can dry at least 3xs as much food! Wish cleaning the trays was easier though. If you use a new nail brush / scrubber it makes it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect I'd love this thing so much
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dehydrator. I expected to use it once in a while, and thought it would be fun to try a few dehydrated foods. Turns out it is much more useful than I'd expected. Dehydrated apple chips are a huge hit. Jerky is a big win as well. Fruit leather is easy and delicious. We have it running every week. The unit is easy to use and easy to clean. It is large, so you'd need large countertops and a place to store it. If you have the room, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: SOUS VIDE CAPABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: SOUS VIDE with two aluminum pans a couple clips and a corded thermometer. It kept the temperature within a degree. I love it because I can set it doe two-three hours and forget about it. Have not dehydrated with it but there are no doubts.
customer_reviews.author: marcjt

customer_reviews.title: Food Dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for fast delivery and excellent product! I'm using it for few months now - absolutely love it! Very happy with your product, thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarmat

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I am having so much fun with this!! Yes, it was expensive, but the large trays, so many of them, the timer, the quietness of it make it worth every penny. I cannot even begin to tell you how good the spicy jerky I made in is was!! And the fruit leather with no added sugar or preservatives...to die for!!
customer_reviews.author: kramersmom

customer_reviews.title: Excalibur makes the best dehydrators in the world, it's BPA free, can adjust temp, has timer
customer_reviews.text: What a freaking beast! Did 6 pounds of jerky last night in 8 hours. So easy to clean. BPA-free sheets. The sheets can be removed without a glove in the middle of dehydrating because they don't get too hot to touch like metal would. The temperature adjustment (many just have on/off or low/high) makes making different types of dried items super easy. THE TIMER IS AWESOME. I cannot recommend this thing more!
customer_reviews.author: Roderic Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much bought it as a gift for friends. Halfway through we turn the trays but otherwise, it just does the work for you. Enjoy the aromas as you dehydrate.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I like this dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: I like this dehydrator. At first it felt like a splurge when I was buying it, but with summer fruits coming in with the abundance, I am using it more and more. Also I can see how it will come handy as a warmer for the natto making as well as yogurt making process.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkelement

customer_reviews.title: I'm a hiker and I make dried fruit for every trip whether day or overnight and love the healthiness and knowing whatever I make
customer_reviews.text: This is the cat's bum. I'm a hiker and I make dried fruit for every trip whether day or overnight and love the healthiness and knowing whatever I make, I am in control of what is in it and therefore what is going into my body. I made gluten free flax crackers with avocado as a binding agent and I'm still learning to make other things. If you buy one of these, get the timer. Otherwise it will end up in the appliance junkyard.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Finally delivered!  But does it work ...?
customer_reviews.text: The delivery date slipped by, but it was delivered on the second date. Thank you! However, the dehydrator arrived with the trays all shoved into cockeyed. It does seem to work, but does it work well...? More time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Goldust

customer_reviews.title: Great Dehydrator... I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the one to go with if you are in the least bit interested in dehydrating to preserve fruits and vegetables. There is plenty of shelf space for drying in bulk, and the trays clean up easily. It's relatively quiet for the size of it, and it couldn't be easier to use. It's large and does take up a lot of counter space, so plan ahead for where you are going to put it before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey5200

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work very well. Very expensive and my tomatoes were still wet after double dehydrated time. Would not recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Love it except for door
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a foot with hinges but machine is a work horse
customer_reviews.author: rita atkinson

product_meta.title: Excalibur 3926TB 9-Tray Electric Food Dehydrator with Temperature Settings and 26-hour Timer Automatic Shut Off for Faster and Efficient Drying Includes Guide to Dehydration Made in USA, 9-Tray, Black
product_meta.description: Dehydration is the healthiest, easiest, and most economical way to preserve foods. Load the trays and set the temperature, the Excalibur dries the contents of all trays evenly so everything's done at once. Dehydration concentrates the natural flavor, sweetness, and aromas of your food. Leaving you with a flavor that's far healthier than high-fat snacks and high-sugar candies that are filled with chemical preservatives. The Excalibur 9-Tray Large Dehydrator provides 15 square feet of drying space making this the biggest and best there is! Ideal for large families, large gardens, craftspeople, and sportsmen. This unit includes flexible polyscreen tray inserts to prevent foods from sticking to trays, 7" fan, built in on/off switch, adjustable thermostat, and a convenient 26 hour timer. Troubleshoot-fan makes a rubbing noise may be due to shipping, the trays may have been forced into the fan’s protective screen. Take out the trays, and blow on the fan blade to locate where it is rubbing against the screen. You may need to turn the fan on and press gently against the screen and listen where the noise increases. With a pair of needle nose pliers pull the screen away from the fan blade at point of contact. Your Excalibur dehydrator offers you the opportunity to cook at lower drying temperatures which increase the immunity boosting vitamin value in foods and keep it boosted for up to 9 months when stored in an airtight container. So, the next time you are looking for ways to improve your wellness, take on a tortoise mentality and know that low and slow will win the immunity race. Your body will thank you! Plastic Trays measure 15 x 15 Inches
feature_bullets: CAPACITY - The 9-Tray electric food dehydrator has 15 square feet of drying space and offers plenty of space for your favorite snacks.

TIME AND TEMPERATURE - Features a 26-hour timer and adjustable thermostat. The thermostat ranges from 105 degrees Fahrenheit to 165 degrees Fahrenheit. The temperature range is low enough to preserve active enzymes in fruits and vegetables and is also high enough to meet safety standards for dehydrating meat for jerky.
LOW AND SLOW FOR IMMUNITY BOOST - Cooking foods at a temperature no higher than 115-118 degrees in a dehydrator preserves nutrients and enzymes.
PATENTED - Parallex Horizontal Airflow is exclusive to Excalibur and helps the food dehydrate faster, retain more nutrients and look and taste better, without tray rotation.

EASY TO USE - Great for large families, gardeners, and sportsmen. Dehydrate fruits, vegetables, nuts, meat for jerky, fruit puree for fruit roll-ups, raise bread, make all natural pet treats, or make homemade yogurt
ACCESSORIES - Includes a flexible poly-screen tray inserts to prevent foods from sticking and trays do not need to be moved or rotated during operation
Includes Guide to Dehydration. Made in USA.
110/120 Volt model designed exclusively for use in North America. 600 Watts

When buying, please check whether the product is "Ships from and sold by " just below the product price to make sure you are receiving this product from the manufacturer of Excalibur to ensure your product is honored.
